content.data: What's New in Version 2.0
General

Select Design Product Version for Advanced S2M Center Material Import 
 
 
 Specify Through Hole Outline Routing Only versus Pocketing 
 
 
 Crystal Report Engine Updated to Crystal Version XI 
 
 
 Change Zoom Window Function from Center Out to Corner to Corner (Stand-Alone S2M Center Only) 
 
 
 Assign A ToolSet as the Outline Tool for a Material 
 
 
 Escape key as hot key to Return/Home arrow 
 
 
 QTY field to the Part Program reports in S2M Center 
 
 
 Alpha-Numeric numbers for NC Run Numbers 
 
 
 S2M Center for Alphacam Introduced (Alphacam Advanced Router Required) 
 
 
 Part Library Added 
 
 
 Import User Defined Part DXF Files 
 
 
 Extend Dado Lengths by Tool Diameter 
 
 
 Specify that Operations Should be Milled from the Unfinished Side Where Possible 
 
 
 Redesigned and Expanded the Functionality of the Filter Parts Utility 
 
 
 Redesigned and Expanded the Reports Functionality 
 
 
 Redesigned and Expanded the Output NC Codes and Labels Utility 
 
 
 View Secondary Parts and Operations 
 
 
 Add Parts from the Library to a Sheet in the Patterns Area (Saw Optimization and Nesting) 
 
 
 Cut, Copy, and Paste Parts from/to a Sheet in the Patterns Area (Saw Optimization and Nesting) 
 
 
 Rotate Parts on a Sheet in the Patterns Area (Nesting) 
 
 
 Allow 3 decimal places in Metric 
 
 
 Support for Alphacam Version 6 
 
 
 Support for Alphacam Version 7 
 
 
 Post Option for Controls that do not Support Compensation on Arcs 
 
 
 License Not Found for XXX Post/Link Error Message - Changed to Prompt for Post Code Entry
